about_text: Uncanny Coffee Hour yI'el, naDev qa'vIn HIvje'maj seS tlhej Hurgh mI'. yuQ Hujqu' wIbuS - naDev nItebHesh He chen Yokai Hurgh juH je.

Odd Bob Dr. Kitsuné (Mitch) je, nIteb lutmey wIqel. Dr. Kitsuné DevwI', Japan qa'mey lutmey je Native Sov je. Odd Bob 'oH American ghojmoHwI' 'e', Celtic Hurgh tIq ghaj, reH Fae magic tlha'. Saoirse, maH Puca, wItlhej, 'ej qeS je lormey je wIqel.
Hoch lut vIt ghaj 'e' wIHar. tIqmo' je vuvqu'mo', qanwI'pu' wIqel, Native lutmey wIleghqu'. naDev maH, ghogh ghajbe'bogh nuvpu'vaD ghogh wInob 'ej Hoch maHvaD rarqangbogh qeS wIqel.
ben law' Qu'vam wIqel. Hat tlhIl, nI' QI', 'ej loS lutmey.
aboutpage.friendo_desc: naDev lut juppu' Daghaj, pagh latlh potlh nuvpu':
aboutpage.aitext: pIm. (DaH) Soj juH je wIghajmeH Qu' nI' wIghaj. maH vIndo' maj... Qu'vam wIghajlaH, 'ach nom maH, 'ej De'wI' QaH wIlo'pu' 'ej lutmey se' je nom wIchenmoH. lut mIllogh chenmoHmeH Human De'wI' je wIlo', 'ej pIm lutmey.
aboutpage.what_podtext: ben QIn Duj rur... QIn Duj retlhDaq ba' 'ej Buck Rogers The Shadow ghap yI'Ij... 'ach poH pIm Dalo'laH! vaj De'wI' tlhIngan Hol ghap talpu' Dalo'... vacuum tubes yItu'... 'ej yI'Ij!

eppage.title: Hoch Lutmey
eppage.transcript: buzzsproutDaq transcriptmey tu'lu' (lutDaq transcript lung yInej).
eppage.subhead: Hoch Huj lut HIvje' chagh, poH pIm.

footer.copyright: The Dr Kitsuné & Odd Bob Uncanny Coffee Hour

hero.title: DaHjaj Lutmey Qul Retlh
hero.subtext: Podcast 'oH nItebHesh lut ghojmoHwI'. Uncanny Coffee Hour tlhIngan Hol lutmey DaHjaj ghojmoHwI' je... wa' HIvje' lo'.

homepage.buycoffeesupport: Buy Me a CoffeeDaq maH yIboQ

lodgepage.title: MaH yImuv! Lut yIboQ!
lodgepage.subhead: Hoch muvwI' juH 'ay' moj 'ej lutmey wIja'bogh wIboQ.

misctext.error_text: Puca ghItlhmajDaq Qu'vam ta'! qa'pu' (pagh De'wI') rarwI' qIl.

1.title: MuSHa' Longma
1.desc: QeD HUtlh lutmey, Lodge Discord 'el, Se'Daq pong.

2.title: TaH Qa'
2.desc: Tier 1 potlh PLUS: Saoirse Pegh Pol (lutmey chel), Fae Jatlh nI' & Qu'mey wIv.

3.title: Brownie BoQ
3.desc: Tier 1 & 2 potlh PLUS: Executive producer jatlh, Physical Merch (loS jar), Hosts qa'vIn (loS jar Zoom ghom).

4.title: Kitsune Tanuki je juppu'!
4.desc: Hoch tier potlh PLUS: Yokai pIm wIchenmoH 'ej Se'Daq lut wIja'.

storypage.title: Huj LutlIj yInob
storypage.subhead: Puca Dalegh'a'? qa'vInlIj ectoplasm rur'a'? maH yIja'.
